channel.title: pwn on AdelaideB9 Blog
channel.description: Recent content in pwn on AdelaideB9 Blog

item.title: Easy Overflow - DuckCTF 2023
item.description: I store all of my private data in all of my programs. I mean, why not? It is safe, right...

item.title: Return Address Override - DuckCTF 2023
item.description: Ok. So buffer overflows exist, but if I put my data in a different function, my private data will be safe from buffer overflows.

item.title: Evil Eval - UACTF 2022
item.description: Made a cool internet calculator for all your maths needs. Well, some of your maths needs.
